items.name: Ales Mixed Case
items.desc:
An ever-changing mixed case of 24 × cans of Villages ales. Currently the case includes:
18 × RODEO Pale Ale • 4.6%
One of our first pals. Rodeo is a light straw colour with a gentle haze. Citrus and grapefruit aromas and flavours come from Citra and Cascade, giving a balanced floral tone. Low bitterness and a soft body. Real refreshing!
2 × SMOOTH BIG CAT Double IPA • 8% • Collab with Drop Project
SMOOTH BIG CAT is a strong and silky double IPA. Heavily hopped with Talus, Simcoe, and Mosaic, and fermented with London Ale III. A smooth, big beer, for a smooth big cat.
2 × REPTILE SMILE West Coast IPA • 7%
REPTILE SMILE is a straight up west coast IPA. Brewed as a partner to our New England IPA SWAMP HOG, both beers showcase the beaut hop Comet, known for its wild American flavours. A homage to our favourite American ales. Big lizard, big smile.
2 × SWAMP HOG New England IPA • 7%
SWAMP HOG is an IPA in the New England style. Brewed as a partner to our west coast IPA REPTILE SMILE, both beers showcase the beaut hop Comet, known for its wild American flavours. A homage to our favourite American ales. When I was a young swamphoggggg!
~~~~~~~
Vegan friendly :-)
330ml & 440ml cans
£5.99 delivery

items.name: Rafiki
items.desc:
RAFIKI is one of our go-to regulars, our low-strength IPA, and a family fave. Tropical notes of mango, passionfruit and guava come from Mosaic and Ekuanot. Smooth bitterness and a sweet biscuity malt flavour.
~~~~~~~
Vegan friendly :-)
330ml cans
£5.99 delivery

items.name: Regulars Mixed Case
items.desc:
A mixed case of 24 × cans of go-to Villages bevs.
8 × RODEO Pale Ale • 4.6%
One of our first pals. Rodeo is a light straw colour with a gentle haze. Citrus and grapefruit aromas and flavours come from Citra and Cascade, giving a balanced floral tone. Low bitterness and a soft body. Real refreshing!
8 × WHISTLE Unfiltered Lager • 4.4%
A crisp, unfiltered lager with lots of flavour. Saaz and Hallertau Mittelfrüh give it those traditional floral and spicy notes. The yeast gives a big ester profile and a clean finish.
8 × RAFIKI Session IPA • 4.3%
Our low-strength IPA, and a family fave. Tropical notes of mango, passionfruit and guava come from Mosaic and Ekuanot. Smooth bitterness and a sweet biscuity malt flavour.
~~~~~~~
Vegan friendly :-)
330ml cans
£5.99 delivery
